description:
Glenn's eye glow super blue! I love 'em!
Glenn is somewhat local, so he drove over late evening after a full day of work. He does construction of sorts, so he is pretty much scraped up good from all that hard labor.
He really likes the idea of making extra money, and with me being practically local, I think he is down for more work. So I know for sure an oral video is in the works.
I set him up with the iPad, and he does a fine job using the FleshJack to show case his cock. A couple times he had to slow down as he was cumming.
In fact, when I nodded he could nut anytime, I was still trying to get things setup, and he let fly. He must have REALLY been holding back.
Ahhhhh...to be 18 again.
Anyway, I hope you enjoy this new guy. He has something extra sexy about him, so stay tuned for more Glenn!
title: Glenn - Solo
